title: Riot, please recolor particles to blue for Dragon Knight Morde.

embed.description: This is a teaser spotlight of Dragon Knight Mordekaiser with ingame gameplay! Purchase RP here and help support this channel via the amazon affiliate program (NA): https://amzn.to/2qZ3Bmv Skin name is CONFIRMED as Dragon Knight Mordekaiser, particles & SFX may not be final. Check out the other skins in this cycle.

body: This is one of the best looking morde skins now, its a shame to see it has nothing different but looks. People complain how it should have dragon effects etc but i know thats way too much for an 520 skin (tho it would be beautiful seeing Dragons fly while in R) we just simply want Blue colors on his skills instead of green ones. Please its not too much to ask. Take your time, no rush but please. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
